an8.45:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an8.45:1.2: Atha kho bojjha upasika yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho bojjham upasikam bhagava etadavoca:
an8.45:2.1: “Atthangasamannagato, bojjhe, uposatho upavuttho mahapphalo hoti mahanisamso mahajutiko mahavippharo.
an8.45:2.2: Katham upavuttho ca, bojjhe, atthangasamannagato uposatho mahapphalo hoti mahanisamso mahajutiko mahavippharo?
an8.45:2.4: ‘yavajivam arahanto panatipatam pahaya panatipata pativirata nihitadanda nihitasattha lajji dayapanna sabbapanabhutahitanukampino viharanti.
an8.45:2.5: Ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam panatipatam pahaya panatipata pativirato nihitadando nihitasattho lajji dayapanno, sabbapanabhutahitanukampi viharami.
an8.45:2.6: Iminapangena arahatam anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati’ti.
an8.45:3.1: ‘Yavajivam arahanto uccasayanamahasayanam pahaya uccasayanamahasayana pativirata nicaseyyam kappenti—mancake va tinasantharake va.
an8.45:3.2: Ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam uccasayanamahasayanam pahaya uccasayanamahasayana pativirato nicaseyyam kappemi—mancake va tinasantharake va.
an8.45:3.3: Iminapangena arahatam anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati’ti.
an8.45:3.5: Evam upavuttho kho, bojjhe, atthangasamannagato uposatho mahapphalo hoti mahanisamso mahajutiko mahavippharo.
an8.45:4.2: Seyyathapi, bojjhe, yo imesam solasannam mahajanapadanam pahutarattaratananam issariyadhipaccam rajjam kareyya, seyyathidam—
an8.45:4.3: anganam magadhanam kasinam kosalanam vajjinam mallanam cetinam vanganam kurunam pancalanam macchanam surasenanam assakanam avantinam gandharanam kambojanam, atthangasamannagatassa uposathassa etam kalam nagghati solasim.
an8.45:4.5: Kapanam, bojjhe, manusakam rajjam dibbam sukham upanidhaya.
an8.45:5.1: Yani, bojjhe, manusakani pannasa vassani, catumaharajikanam devanam eso eko rattindivo.
an8.45:5.4: Tena samvaccharena dibbani panca vassasatani catumaharajikanam devanam ayuppamanam.
an8.45:5.5: Thanam kho panetam, bojjhe, vijjati yam idhekacco itthi va puriso va atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavasitva kayassa bheda param marana catumaharajikanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
an8.45:5.6: Idam kho panetam, bojjhe, sandhaya bhasitam:
an8.45:6.5: solasa vassasatani paranimmitavasavattinam devanam eso eko rattindivo.
an8.45:6.8: Tena samvaccharena dibbani solasa vassasahassani paranimmitavasavattinam devanam ayuppamanam.
an8.45:6.9: Thanam kho panetam, bojjhe, vijjati yam idhekacco itthi va puriso va atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavasitva kayassa bheda param marana paranimmitavasavattinam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
an8.45:6.10: Idam kho panetam, bojjhe, sandhaya bhasitam:
an8.45:7.2: Musa na bhase na ca majjapo siya;
an8.45:8.1: Malam na dhare na ca gandhamacare,
an8.45:9.1: Cando ca suriyo ca ubho sudassana,
an8.45:12.1: Tasma hi nari ca naro ca silava,
